result.arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ
result.translation: Kandi mu by’ukuri iyo (Qur’an) iri Iwacu mu gitabo gihatse ibindi byose,[1] rwose irahambaye kandi yuje ubuhanga.
result.footnotes: [1] Igitabo gihatse ibindi kivugwa muri uyu murongo ni urubaho rurinzwe rwanditsweho igeno ry’ibizaba kuzageza ku munsi w’imperuka (Lawuh ul Mah’fudhi).
